about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate Full-Stack Developer dedicated to building scalable, high-performance web applications. With a strong foundation in the JavaScript ecosystem and experience in .NET and PHP, I enjoy solving complex problems and creating intuitive user experiences. I thrive in collaborative Agile environments and am constantly learning new technologies to stay ahead of industry trends.

description: Architect and implement scalable features using ASP.NET Core and Next.js.
Containerize applications with Docker for consistent deployment environments.

Completed an intensive internship focused on full-stack web development.
Gained practical experience with ASP.NET Core, Next.js, and MSSQL.
Participated in code reviews and debugging sessions to ensure code quality.
Utilized Slack and Trello for effective team communication and project management.
Specialized in backend development for ERP systems.

projects.title: Survey Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive survey management system allowing users to create, distribute, and analyze surveys. Features include real-time data visualization, customizable templates, and secure user authentication.

projects.title: Convo Chat
projects.description: A real-time messaging application built for seamless communication. Supports instant messaging, group chats, and user status updates, leveraging WebSockets for low-latency performance.

projects.title: Unichem Store
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform designed for chemical products. Includes a dynamic product catalog, shopping cart functionality, secure checkout integration, and an admin dashboard.

projects.title: WatchBox
projects.description: A personal movie and TV show tracker that lets users discover new content, track their watch history, and create custom lists. Integrated with a third-party movie database API.

projects.title: NextSched
projects.description: An intuitive scheduling application for managing appointments and events. Features a drag-and-drop calendar interface, automated reminders, and conflict detection.
